plot: On the Menu is the first cooking competition show to give viewers the chance to taste the winning dish. Each week, four passionate home cooks are challenged to create a new signature dish for the featured restaurant.
plot_en: On the Menu is the first cooking competition show to give viewers the chance to taste the winning dish. Each week, four passionate home cooks are challenged to create a new signature dish for the featured restaurant.
plot_es: On the Menu is the first cooking competition show to give viewers the chance to taste the winning dish. Each week, four passionate home cooks are challenged to create a new signature dish for the featured restaurant.
title: On the Menu
